title: What should I fill all my Shulker Boxes with? (Minecraft General)
body:
I was really lucky and came across an end city without much exploration. I had a looting 3 sword on me and managed to get 17 Shulker Shells, Enough for 8 Shulker boxes. I've already decided the red one in my off-hand should be for potions. What should I put in the other ones? Thinking of a few for basic mats for building and maybe one for redstone stuff.

Also I found 2 Elytra so that's really nice!

replies.body: Good to see Niji is back, i've missed board shit posting

>
> Good to see Niji is back, i've missed board shit posting

I'd never shitpost

You should consider, filling up some of them with building blocks and red stone. It will be very convenient for building . You should consider, storing food in one of them, as all that building will drain your hunger bar and will require lots of food in order to recover.

> [{quoted}](name=NIghtshadowb,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qE8JwTAr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-27T11:23:28.644+0000)
>
> You should consider, filling up some of them with building blocks and red stone. It will be very convenient for building . You should consider, storing food in one of them, as all that building will drain your hunger bar and will require lots of food in order to recover.

Yeah good idea, I can also use them for storing materials when mining. When I mine end game I do it with a Beacon with Haste/Speed at max level. I usually have my inventory with nothing but ore and minerals in like 20-30 minutes.
don't forget, it is always absolutely compulsary to add arrows and diamonds in to your shulker boxes, you never know when you might need to fight them creepers!

I have basically my entire storage in Shulker boxes now so yeah I'm fine to set up bases or fight and craft anywhere.

Okay guys I waited out my 3-day ban so here we go.

I fought the Ender Dragon again, got another end island portal, found another end city. Got lucky and got 26 Shulker shell's (massive city+looting 3). Now I am moving to a coral reef because I have a conduit there and have for ages now.
